articles.author: Philipp Wehsack
articles.title: A nutritionist explains: You can tell by these 7 signs that you're not drinking enough - VOGUE India
articles.description: Are you not drinking enough water? Don't ignore these seven signs of dehydration, according to a doctor
articles.content: We've all been told, at some point or the other, that our skin problems exist because we're just not drinking enough water. The human body consists of around 70 per cent water and we lose up to two a… [+2167 chars]
